text: Angiolo Bandinelli (21 March 1927 â€“ 6 February 2022) was an Italian Radical Party politician. He was in the Chamber of Deputies from 1986 to 1987. He was born in Chianciano Terme, Kingdom of Italy. Bandinelli died on 6 February 2022, at the age of 94. ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Politicians from Tuscany
title: Angiolo Bandinelli
